alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 12:41PM MST until November 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow, moderate at times. Storm total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the mountain-valleys with 4 to 9 inches in the mountains above 6500 ft MSL. North winds increasing and gusting as high as 30 mph Thursday afternoon and night resulting in areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...The mountains surrounding Spencer, Island Park, and Driggs. * WHEN...From midnight Wednesday night to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions and potential travel delays.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley
